findStrings.find: static toByteArray(data, numBytes) { if (Array.isArray(data)) { data = data.reverse(); } else { if (typeof data === "string") { data = parseInt(data); } let residual = data; data = []; while (residual > 0) { data.push(residual%256); residual = Math.floor(residual/256); } } while (data.length < numBytes) { data.push(0); } data = data.reverse(); return data; };

task.summary: Default task
Update documentation
Change deviceID format in API to match other transmitters Add support for all blinds1 device types Add error checking
Added unit tests and fixed the errors they showed up
Add blinds1 receive event. Add new BLINDS_T13 subtype
Add setLowerLimit() & reverse() commands; all receive events now contain a unitcode; clean up many warnings
Remove set() command, replaced by setLimit(). Fix bugs in blinds1 event processing
Update to serialport 4.0.4
Merge gizmoto RFY changes

Serialport 4.0.4 Add rfy packet ASA subtype handling Add _timeoutHandler to all transmitters, and call it when a timeout occurs Change signature of queueMessage to add sender to the parameters list Refactor: RfxCom.debugLog() replaces console.log() Add remoteType to remotes list params, remove 'unknown' Handle 'unknown remote' response packets Add 'rfyremoteslist' event; handle the case of no registered remotes correctly

Add extra parameters to "response" event, and handle new cases Add formatted ID string to "rfyremoteslist" event parameter Change to standard format for ID parameters, add range checking & invalid command checking Bug fixes to do() command; add venetian blinds commands Extensive additional unit tests Improved documentation
Remove the remaining potentially dangerous type-coercing comparison operators
Update to serialport 4.*
Update README.md
Added BBQ sensor handling
Added AOKE relay to lighting5 Update jasmine dependency to <2.0.0
Fix typo
Curtain1: require subtype, add range-checking, accept array deviceID, deviceID format changed to be like lightning1 Lighting1: always parse unit number as decimal
Remove deprecated util.isArray() & require engines >=4.0.0
Add lighting1 subtype "HB' (0x0b)"
Add lighting5 subtypes TRC02_2, EURODOMEST, LIVOLO_APPLIANCE, RGB432W, MDREMOTE_107, LEGRAND, AVANTEK, IT, MDREMOTE_108, & KANGTAI Add keywords to package.json
Correct lighting6/BLYSS maximum unit number from 8 to 5 Add Screenline (BLINDS_T13) venetion blinds commands to Blinds1
Add packet type 0x1B, Home Confort
HomeConfort changed to a subclass of Transmitter
Rfy changed to a subclass of Transmitter
Remaining transmitters changed to subclasses of Transmitter
Made stringToBytes etc., static methods of RfxCom class Added support for camera1 (receive only) Added support for fan packet transmitter Started moving to ES6 syntax for classes etc.

Refactored path-splitting into the Transmitter class Added setOptions() method to the Transmitter class Added new transmitters: Camera1, Radiator1, Remote, Security1, Thermostat1-4 Added new receive events: remote, thermostat1, thermostat3 Changed a few receive events to use camelCase keys consistently everywhere
Replace Thermostat1.sendMessage() parameters with a single object Correct start-up delay to 50ms
Added LightwaveRF lock()/unlock() commands Removed the mood & level setting option from LightwaveRF switchOn() command Added dimming & scene control to LIVOLO_APPLIANCE
Change RFY to use options.venetianBlindsMode instead of separate EU & US venetian blinds commands
Added sendRaw() method to the Transmitter object, and added unit tests Added unit tests for Security1.switchOffLight()
Add Cartelectronic packet type Change to one receive event per packet type, and make event names more consistent Update documentation Add alpha prerelease tag
Improve consistency of event names & exports
Add debugging script
Now calls the initialise() callback only when the device is fully initialised Set status command enable() now uses the transmit queue
Now calls the initialise() callback only when the device is fully initialised Set status command enable() now uses the transmit queue
Add Transmitter.packetNumber to all transmitters Add transmitterPacketTypes[] to exports Lighting4.toByteArray() now static
Refactor common transmitter functions into the Transmitter class Changed the busy wait while initialising the RFXtrx433 to a setTimeout()
Added Date/Time (0x58) packet handling

Add find-rfxcom & set-protocols scripts Update the list of receive protocols that can be enabled in the firmware to match version 1020 Add transmitter receive power to the status information Add "receiverstarted" event
